entry.summary: ...Snow Showers Through This Evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Accumulations from 0.5 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Star Valley and the Salt and Wyoming Ranges.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 2:50PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snow Showers with Gusty Winds into the Evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Accumulations of 1 to 2 inches expected. East to northeast wind gusting 20 to 30 mph. Blowing and drifting snow.
